api-category.name: API Settings
api-category.description: Control how the mod interacts with the SendDB API

cacheTime.name: Cache Time (minutes)
cacheTime.description: How long to cache SendDB data for (in minutes)

leaderboardPerPage.name: Leaderboard Entries Per Page
leaderboardPerPage.description: The number of entries to show per page in leaderboards

display-category.name: Display Settings
display-category.description: Control how SendDB data is displayed in-game

graphStyle.name: Graph Style
graphStyle.description: The style of the graphs displayed

trendingSamplePoints.name: Trending Sample Points
trendingSamplePoints.description: The number of sample points to use for the trending graph

shaders.name: Enable Shaders
shaders.description: Enable shaders for backgrounds and other effects
